body.p:
To his excellency Thomas E. Bramlette Governor of the Commonwealth of Kentucky. whereas on the 28th day of March 1864 a Jury of Pulaski County Empaneled and sworn found a verdict against Robert Burdin or Judgment for the sum of Sixty dollars for Tipling committed in the Year 1860. we the undersigned citizens would respectfully request your Honor to remit said fine. he is an old man some Seventy years of age verry poor living with a widowed Daughter who is also verry poor and is wholy dependant upon her for a support. and the Old man is partially parallized. has no use of one arm and hand, and is now in the Jail of our county. and has no means to pay said fine If you can consistently remit said fine you will confer a lasting favor upon and much oblige your petitioners
June 15th 1865

J E. Cosson
E. D. Perch
J. T. S. Smith
Robt. L Hendson. Sr.
J S Dutton
W F Scott
S M Haile
J B Girdler
Mit. E. Ingram
C H Richardson
